content:
Also, 116 infrastructure facilities in ten regions of Ukraine were attacked.

About thisreported March 20Military Media Center with reference to information provided by the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine.

Enemy shelling was carried out from a variety of weapons: mortars, tanks, barrel and rocket artillery, anti-aircraft missile systems, operational-tactical missiles, UAVs and tactical aircraft.

There are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

BeforeThe Armyinform reportedthat the enemy dropped 15 guided aerial bombs on a small community in the Sumy region during the day.
title: During the day Russia fired at 138 Ukrainian settlements
description: This was reported on March 20 by Military Media Center with reference to information provided ...
author: Army Inform
